sentences.en: He was at pains to insist on the perspicuity of what he wrote ( Lionel Trilling )
sentences.cn: 他努力坚持作品的清楚明晰 ( 赖恩内尔特里林 )

sentences.en: However , both the perspicuity of property rights and liberty market are important factors for Assets Capitalization.
sentences.cn: 我国的资产权属模糊与交易体系不完善,已成为资产资本化的现实困境.

sentences.en: Secondly, carrying out MBO is beneficial to the perspicuity of the property right of the state-owned enterprises and the settlement of the problem of the "Red Hat" enterprises.
sentences.cn: 第二个方面，笔者以为，通过MBO可以明晰国有企业产权，解决历史遗留下来的“红帽子”企业问题。

sentences.en: Secondly, this paper analyzes the relations between product perspicuity, which is treated as the key dimension of construction project, and transaction cost.
sentences.cn: 其次，本文以产品明晰度为建设项目的关键特性，详细分析了它与各项建设项目交易成本的密切联系。

sentences.en: The formation of this thought experienced the development process from mistiness to perspicuity from acknowledgement to protection presented dipartite layered and stable theory characteristics.
sentences.cn: 这一思想的形成经历了由模糊到明晰、由承认到保护的发展过程，呈现出区分性、层次性和稳定性的理论特质。

sentences.en: The key of modern enterprise system is property right perspicuity.
sentences.cn: 建立现代企业制度的核心是产权明晰。

sentences.en: The website functional module clear perspicuity, the connection is compact.
sentences.cn: 网站的功能模块清晰明了, 连接紧凑.

sentences.en: We can say: not only Marxist philosophy but also the whole philosophy history has ever been the history of the gradually perspicuity and deepenness of "practice" conception.
sentences.cn: 可以这样说：不仅马克思主义哲学，而且整个哲学史都是“实践”范畴不断明晰、不断深化的发展史。

words.tran_cn: （语言、文章、表达等的）明晰；简明
